name: Yorii Auto Parts Co., Ltd.
description: A local company engaged in the manufacturing and sales of auto parts. Provides high-quality parts.

name: Sato's Local Diner
description: A popular diner with a homely atmosphere. Proud of dishes made with local ingredients.

name: Yorii Electronics Corp.
description: A company engaged in the development and sales of electronic devices. Provides the latest technology to the community.

name: Tanaka Flower Shop
description: A flower shop with a wide variety of seasonal flowers and gift arrangements.

name: Yorii Sake Brewery
description: A long-established sake brewery making local sake using traditional methods. Tours are also available.

name: Matsumoto Machining
description: A local factory specializing in precision machining. Supports small-lot, multi-variety production.

name: Yorii Rice Farm
description: Produces and sells delicious local rice. Direct sales available.
